short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the annoying What's Happening Tab on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove that annoying "What's Happening" section from Twitter and stay focused on your curated timeline.

No more clickbait.

Only zen.

Works with 20 different Twitter UI supported languages including English, French, German, Arabic, Spanish, Italian, Hebrew, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, etc.
